background: Custom Tees needs to allocate a budget for purchasing clicks from different advertisement types to maximize the number of unique clicks.
constraints: Total cost of clicks from all advertisement types must not exceed Budget
Number of clicks from each advertisement type must not exceed its corresponding MaxClicks
Number of young audience clicks from all advertisement types must reach at least GoalYoung
Number of old audience clicks from all advertisement types must reach at least GoalOld
Number of unique young audience clicks from all advertisement types must reach at least GoalUniqueYoung
Number of unique old audience clicks from all advertisement types must reach at least GoalUniqueOld
Number of clicks from each advertisement type is non-negative
objective: Maximize the number of unique clicks from all advertisement types within the given Budget
description: How many clicks from each ad type should Custom Tees purchase to maximize the number of unique clicks within the \param{Budget}? Consider the following parameters: the total number of advertisement types (\param{A}), costs of purchasing a click from each advertisement type (\param{Costs}), the maximum number of clicks that can be purchased from each advertisement type (\param{MaxClicks}), the number of young audience clicks from each advertisement type (\param{YoungClicks}), the number of old audience clicks from each advertisement type (\param{OldClicks}), and the number of unique clicks from each advertisement type (\param{UniqueClicks}). Additionally, consider the goals for the number of clicks from the young (\param{GoalYoung}) and old (\param{GoalOld}) audience, as well as the goals for the number of unique clicks from the young (\param{GoalUniqueYoung}) and old (\param{GoalUniqueOld}) audience.

parameters.definition: Cost of purchasing a click from advertisement type a
Number of maximum clicks that can be purchased from advertisement type a
Number of young audience clicks from advertisement type a
Number of old audience clicks from advertisement type a
Number of unique clicks from advertisement type a
Goal for number of clicks from young audience
Goal for number of clicks from old audience
Goal for number of unique clicks from young audience
Goal for number of unique clicks from old audience
